buildCommand: cd frontend && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && source $HOME/.cargo/env && export PATH=$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH && rustup install 1.81.0 && rustup default 1.81.0 && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install trunk && trunk build --release
installCommand: cd frontend && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && source $HOME/.cargo/env && export PATH=$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH && rustup install 1.81.0 && rustup default 1.81.0 && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown
